Articles.Content:
So, with .22 almost upon us, and no good place to discuss, I made this thread.

What are you most excited about for .22?

Oh, and do not troll, spam, or ask when it will be released.

was a couple page down but i guess this thread would be kind of similar to this:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/49799-The-official-unofficial-0-22-discussion-thread
Oh, and some pictures:

was a couple page down but i guess this thread would be kind of similar to this:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/49799-The-official-unofficial-0-22-discussion-thread

Woops. Oh well

I'm looking forward to the sub assembly loader. Getting jets to Laythe is about to get a lot easier.

I suppose the career mode will be fun as well.

The other thread is longer, but rather than bump it I'll go with this one.

I'm actually really excited for career mode. I tend to play that way anyway - One of my traditions with every new version is to start over from scratch, and my first flight is always a small SRB with a pod a parachute on top, and I plant a flag wherever it lands. Then gradually re-explore the system with stock or with mods depending on what I feel like doing for variety.

As someone who has been using the sub assembly mod, and utterly loving it's Amazingness, I'm really, really hoping to be able to choose the root or principal part as well. I know there is a mod for that too but I didn't get it to work. Obviously my idiocy as others used it fine.

However, how about loading a subassembly, holding down a generic key and then the next part you click on the subassembly when you pick it up becomes the root or principle part.

That would be awesome.

Otherwise .22 looks really nice to me. Looking forward to it lots.
No good place to discuss 0.22? YOU'VE GOT TO BE KIDDING ME.

No good place to discuss 0.22? YOU'VE GOT TO BE KIDDING ME.

10char

No good place to discuss 0.22? YOU'VE GOT TO BE KIDDING ME.

See? only 2 pages.

Besides, if the search function tends to work better for more unpopular stuff. If you want to find the release thread of a popular Mod like MechJeb using that, you will find it buried between all the other threads where someone mentions it (now including this one )
I want career mode, and that new KSC building placement is so much better then the one now
Does anyone know if career mode will keep a running total of how much science you have collected?
Does anybody know what new parts we will get?

Does anybody know what new parts we will get?

New shock absorbent medium legs, Science stuff and antennas. Also the avionics part is now and antenna I think
Are the larger legs that are in the game now also shock absorbent?

Are the larger legs that are in the game now also shock absorbent?

I believe they all have some sort of shocks

I believe they all have some sort of shocks

Yeah, they all have shocks.

-snip- Also the avionics part is now and antenna I think

No, I'm pretty sure it's a science instrument of sorts.

The other thread is longer, but rather than bump it I'll go with this one.

I'm actually really excited for career mode. I tend to play that way anyway - One of my traditions with every new version is to start over from scratch, and my first flight is always a small SRB with a pod a parachute on top, and I plant a flag wherever it lands. Then gradually re-explore the system with stock or with mods depending on what I feel like doing for variety.

I'm looking forward to starting over. I started installing every mod I could find, and then got lost in all the parts. I ended up wiping and reloading KSP just to get back to the basics, but I'm really looking forward to this again with .22!

Besides, if the search function tends to work better for more unpopular stuff. If you want to find the release thread of a popular Mod like MechJeb using that, you will find it buried between all the other threads where someone mentions it (now including this one )

I didn't even have to search "title only".

I didn't even have to search "title only".

-snip-

Can we please stop arguing about this? It's one of those things that gets these type of threads locked.
Yes, I am sorry.

(breaks down door and runs inside gasping air)

Guys... tomorrow.... .22 .... released....

(breaks down door and runs inside gasping air)

Guys... tomorrow.... .22 .... released....

*News helicopter flies over Squad HQ.

Do you copy? Ok. Hello, this is Kerbal News, bringing you the latest in development news. For the first time in the new era, the gods have given us a... *crowd gasps... RELEASE DATE!!1one!

We will cover the server breakdown once it starts happening. Until next time, this was Jenny Kerman.
